main event: A UFO was observed over Long Island, New York, on 6 December 1957, described as an elongated object with a luminous tail.
interesting points: The object was reported to have been the size of a pencil and had a forward portion that was blue white., The UFO emitted a reddish and bluish white color with a visible trail resembling rocket exhaust., The sighting lasted only 5 seconds and was observed visually while shoveling snow., The object was seen traveling very fast in a south-southeast direction., It was speculated that some reports might confuse the sighting with a possibly earlier launched military rocket.
witness description: Observer was outside during the sighting and was engaged in shoveling snow.
